name: Iris Hacker
description:
Iris hacker is a free fast paced puzzle game that puts the player against the clock and Iris a Rogue AI set on destroying the world. The player must to solve 10 mazes through pure dumb luck or skill. Trial and error will be your best friend.

The game's features are simple and easy to learn but hard to master. The player can only move after touching a wall so treat every movement like it’s your last. There is also Iris trying to stop the player through a constantly shrinking circle of death which engulfs the map quickly, so be on your toes.

Check out the trailer here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZITYT_cGVM8
